action-managewiki-core: manage core settings for this wiki
action-managewiki-extensions: enable and disable extensions for this wiki
action-managewiki-namespaces: create, delete, and manage namespaces for this wiki
action-managewiki-permissions: create, delete, and manage user groups on this wiki
action-managewiki-settings: manage advanced settings for this wiki
apihelp-query+wikiconfig-paramvalue-prop: Check if the wiki is marked as closed
View which extensions are enabled on the wiki
Check if the wiki is exempt from inactivity
Check if the wiki is marked as inactive
View the permissions of these user groups
Check if the wiki is marked as private
View the settings of the wiki
View the sitename of the wiki
apihelp-query+wikiconfig-summary: View sitename, inactive, inactive-exempt, closed, private, extensions, settings and permissions for the specified wiki.
apiwarn-wikiconfig-nopermission: You are not allowed to view the configuration for wiki '$1'.
log-description-managewiki: This log tracks all changes to this wiki's settings through ManageWiki.
logentry-managewiki-rights-reset: $1 {{GENDER:$2|reset}} group permissions to the defaults for "$4"
logentry-managewiki-rights: $1 {{GENDER:$2|changed}} group metadata for $3: added rights $4; removed rights $5; added addgroups $6; removed addgroups $7; added removegroups $8; removed removegroups $9; added addgroupstoself $10; removed addgroupstoself $11; added removegroupsfromself $12; removed removegroupsfromself $13; modified autopromotion ($14)
managewiki-core-info: Insert the database name of the wiki you wish to view core configuration for.
managewiki-desc: Allows users to manage their wiki's configuration with ease through a web interface.
managewiki-disabled: This "$1" module has not been enabled on this wiki and cannot be used.
managewiki-error-conflict: The extension "$1" cannot enabled because it conflicts with $2.
managewiki-error-emptygroup: You cannot create a group without any permissions assigned.
managewiki-error-install: The extension "$1" failed to be enabled. If this keeps occurring, please
managewiki-error-requirements: The extension "$1" cannot be enabled because it fails to meet its requirements.
managewiki-extension-settings: Manage available configuration options for this extension
managewiki-header-core: Select what you would like to manage below, and click the save button to save your changes.
managewiki-header-extensions:
The extensions here are the ones that are currently installed, but you can always [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Request_features request] another one to be added.
Once you are done, press the "save" button to save your changes.
managewiki-header-namespaces: Select a namespace to edit below (talk namespaces are associated to their main namespace) or press the button to create a new main namespace.
managewiki-header-permissions: Select a group below that already exists to modify or create a new user group in the box below.
managewiki-header-settings:
This page is used to manage the wiki settings of wiki '$1'. If a feature you would like is not available here yet, please use [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Request_features Phabricator] to request it.
Once you are done, press the "save" button to save your changes.
managewiki-invalid-database: $1 is an invalid database. Given by $$2.
managewiki-label-inactive-exempt-reason: Select the reason for this exemption from inactivity.
managewiki-mwlocked: This wiki has had its ability to use ManageWiki restricted.
managewiki-namespace-conflicts: The namespace "$1" already exists and cannot be modified.
managewiki-namespaces-create-info: Use the field below to create a new namespace.
managewiki-namespaces-select-info: Below is a list of all the namespaces that exist on this wiki. Use the dropdown below to select a namespace you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
managewiki-ns-invalidid: Namespace IDs must be an even integer to edit through ManageWiki.
managewiki-permissions-assigned: The below user rights are currently assigned to this user group.
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-age: Must have been a user for the following number of days
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-conds: ...none of the conditions must be met
For a user to be promoted...
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-editc: Must have made the following number of edits
managewiki-permissions-autopromote-group: Must be a member of the following groups
managewiki-permissions-autopromote: Below you can manage autopromotion of users to this group. Note that if a user matches the critera you set below, they will inherit all permissions of this group and you can not remove them from this group under any circumstance unless you select promoting them once before they meet the criteria.
managewiki-permissions-create-info: Use the field below to create a new user group on this wiki.
managewiki-permissions-group: Below you can allow how this user group can assign/unassign other user groups.
managewiki-permissions-select-info: Below is a list of all the groups that exist on this wiki. Use the dropdown below to select a group you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
managewiki-permissions-unassigned: The user rights below are currently not assigned to this user group:
managewiki-toggle-forcesidebar: Force the display of ManageWiki links in the sidebar.
managewiki-unavailable-notglobalwiki: This page is unavailable on this wiki. Please visit your farm's central wiki to use this page.
managewiki-warning-changes:
You've made changes to ManageWiki that have not been saved yet.
If you leave this page without clicking "$1" your ManageWiki changes will not be updated.
managewikidefaultpermissions: Manage default permissions for new wikis
managewikidefaultpermissions-create-info: Use the field below to create a user group which will be automatically created on new wikis from now on.
managewikidefaultpermissions-resetcache-: This option allows you to reset this wiki's CreateWiki cache. This is useful in some cases when settings changes are not being propagated correctly.
managewikidefaultpermissions-resetgroups:
This option allows you to reset this wiki's user groups configurations to the defaults defined in Special:ManageWikiDefaultPermissions on the central wiki. This option will not reset groups defined manually.

Please proceed with caution when using this option.
Reset this wiki's groups to the defaults
managewikidefaultpermissions-resetsettin: This option resets this wiki's configuration to the defaults, discarding all settings set through [[Special:ManageWiki/settings]]. Core settings, extensions, namespaces, and user groups are not affected.
Reset this wiki's settings to the defaults
managewikidefaultpermissions-select-info: Below is a list of groups that are automatically created on new wikis. Use the dropdown below to select a group you wish to manage or view the configuration for.
managewikidefaultpermissions-view: View default permissions for new wikis
namespaces-aliases: Add all undefined namespaces which should redirect to this one.
namespaces-content: Does this namespace contain main wiki material (content)?
namespaces-contentmodel: What should this namespace's content model be?
namespaces-delete-checkbox: Checking this box will cause this namespace to be deleted
namespaces-migrate-to: If this namespace is deleted, what namespace should pages on this namespace be moved to?
namespaces-protection: Which userright should be needed to edit this namespace?
namespaces-search: Should this namespace be searchable by default?
namespaces-subpages: Should this namespace have subpages enabled?
right-remotewiki: Remotely manage a wiki's core settings
right-managewiki-core: Manage core settings for this wiki
right-managewiki-extensions: Enable and disable extensions for this wiki
right-managewiki-namespaces: Create, delete, and manage namespaces for this wiki
right-managewiki-permissions: Create, delete, and manage user groups on this wiki
right-managewiki-settings: Manage advanced settings for this wiki
